name: Avoid undocumented JavaScript Functions (PHP)
description: This rule searches for all the undocumented JavaScript Functions.
output:
This report lists all undocumented JavaScript Functions.

This QR provides the following information:
JavaScript Function full name.
rationale: Code maintainability is improved if code is accompanied with comments. This rule ensures that comments exist for JavaScript Functions.
remediation: Modify the source code to reduce the number of undocumented JavaScript Functions.
